There’s so much to see and do in London, the choice is yours! Take a ride on the London Eye, watch a West End Theatre musical, eat classic British pub grub and you can’t go home without visiting the Tower of London and Tower Bridge. The best way to explore London and see its famous sights is with a 2-day Hop-on Hop-off bus tour, driving past Buckingham Palace, Big Ben, Trafalgar Square and more. Cruise along the Thames River passing landmarks and stay in one of our favourite hotels. This is just a 'taste' to get you started! Visit London’s famous landmarks, including Buckingham Palace, Tower of London, Big Ben, Trafalgar Square, the London Eye and more. Make sure to pre-book the Buckingham Palace State Rooms in advance, as its only open during the summer months. Watch a dazzling West End Theatre musical or show. There are many options; from Les Misérables and Wicked to Lion King, take your pick! Grab dinner in Covent Garden before the show; we love the ‘J Sheekey’ restaurant. World-Class Shopping. From high-end stores in Mayfair to vintage treasures at Camden Market to arts and crafts at Notting Hill’s Portobello Market, London offers a shopping experience like no other. After shopping up a storm in Harrods Department Store, dine in one of their 4 big food halls or buy food to take to nearby Hyde Park for a picnic.
